EmailTemplate.textOnly: Whether you have 10 or 100,000 ATMs, you’re constantly wondering: - Are you PCI compliant? - Are all ATMs running the latest security patch? - Can you provide the same service to remote locations? - Can you tell whether there’s a software vs. hardware problem? And those are just some of the reasons FIs are handing these burdens to an ATM as a Service partner.
